org.domainobject.util.convert

Interface Stringifier<IN>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Converter<IN,java.lang.String>

    public interface Stringifier<IN>
extends Converter<IN,java.lang.String>
    Callback interface for converting an object to a String

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Stringifier<java.lang.Object> BASIC_STRINGIFIER
      Basic, null-safe stringifier that simply calls toString() on the specified object.
      static Stringifier<java.lang.Object> JAVA_STRINGIFIER
      Basic, null-safe stringifier that simply calls toString() on the specified object.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.domainobject.util.convert.Converter

        execute

    • Field Detail

      • BASIC_STRINGIFIER

        static final Stringifier<java.lang.Object> BASIC_STRINGIFIER
        Basic, null-safe stringifier that simply calls toString() on the specified object. When passing null, the execute method returns an empty string (not "null"!).

      • JAVA_STRINGIFIER

        static final Stringifier<java.lang.Object> JAVA_STRINGIFIER
        Basic, null-safe stringifier that simply calls toString() on the specified object. When passing null, the execute method returns the string "null".
